means: 偶然地，意外地，非故意地

sentence.Network_en: A special locking system means the door cannot be opened accidentally.
sentence.Network_cn: 特殊的锁定系统使门不会被意外打开。

sentence.Network_en: Flavell had accidentally discharged a pistol, firing it into the ceiling.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗拉维尔不小心扳动了一把手枪的扳机，子弹射入了天花板。

sentence.Network_en: She accidentally knocked the tea tin off the shelf.
sentence.Network_cn: 她不小心把架子上的茶叶罐碰了下来。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新概念英语第二册46---68课课文_百度知道 ... examine  v. 检查 accidentally  adv. 意外地，偶然地 remains  n. 尸体，残骸.
新视野大学英语1-4册单词表 - 豆丁网 ... accidental a. 意外的 accidentally ad. 意外地 mission n. 使命,任务.
His sister accidentally broke the teapot , she really is like china shop., 他的妹妹一不小心就将茶壶打破了 , 可真是个冒失鬼.
If you accidentally ate poisonous mushroom , it should be how to do ?, 如果不慎吃了有毒的野生菌 , 应该怎么办呢?

list.abs: accessories 附件accidental coincidence 偶然符合accidental degeneracy 偶然退化
Sinograma « 失 » - Diccionario de Sinogramas ... 失收[ poor crop] 失手[ accidentally drop] 失守[ fall].
《数学专业英语词汇》 - 豆丁网 ... accidental coincidence 偶然符合 accidental error 随机误差 accommodation 第.
石油词汇英语翻译(AB) ... accidental relief 崎岖地形 accidental shutdown 事故停机 accidental 偶然的.

entry.def: An accidental event happens by chance or as the result of an accident, and is not deliberately intended.

example.ex: The jury returned a verdict of accidental death...
example.tran: 陪审团作出意外死亡的正式裁决。

example.ex: His hand brushed against hers; it could have been either accidental or deliberate.
example.tran: 就在有意无意间，他的手轻轻拂过她的手。

sentences.sentence: "these magnificent achievements were only incidentally influenced by Oriental models"

means.word_mean: 3. without intention; in an unintentional manner;

auth_sentence.content: They accidentally killed her mother, Ms Corelli says.
auth_sentence.res_content: They accidentally killed her mother, Ms Corelli says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They accidentally killed her mother, Ms Corelli says.

auth_sentence.content: What to do if your pet accidentally ingests a medicine?
auth_sentence.res_content: What to do if your pet accidentally ingests a medicine?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What to do if your pet accidentally ingests a medicine?

auth_sentence.content: But saying that evolution happened accidentally does not make sense.
auth_sentence.res_content: But saying that evolution happened accidentally does not make sense.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But saying that evolution happened accidentally does not make sense.

Sentence.sentence: For example, one who doesn't know the rules a about plagiarism (剽窃) may accidentally use words or ideas without giving proper credit or one who fails to keep careful research notes may unintentionally fail to quote and cite sources as required.

means.word_mean: 偶然地；意外地；非故意地

sentences.en: It was self-evident to her that anything so wonderful could not have evolved accidentally.
sentences.cn: 她明显认为如此美妙的事不可能是偶然发生的。

sentences.en: She accidentally swallowed a glass bead.
sentences.cn: 她不小心吞下了一颗玻璃珠。

sentences.en: My arm accidentally struck against the table.
sentences.cn: 我的胳膊不小心撞到桌子上。

sentences.en: She accidentally splashed oil over her apron while cooking lunch.
sentences.cn: 做午饭时,她不小心把围裙溅上了油。

sentences.en: I’m in his bad books at the moment because I accidentally broke the window.
sentences.cn: 现在他对我没有好感,因为我无意中打碎了窗玻璃。

sentences.en: I accidentally spilled my drink all over him.
sentences.cn: 我不小心把饮料溅得他浑身都是。

sentences.en: I accidentally knocked the vase off the table.
sentences.cn: 我无意中碰落了桌上的花瓶。

sentences.en: I accidentally hit my knee on the desk.
sentences.cn: 我的膝盖不小心撞到了桌子。

sentences.en: He accidentally knocked over an ink bottle.
sentences.cn: 他无意中把墨水瓶打翻了。

sentences.en: As I turned around,I accidentally hit him in the face.
sentences.cn: 我转身时不经意撞了他的脸。

sentences.en: He accidentally trod on her foot.
sentences.cn: 他不小心踩了她的脚。

sentences.en: She gave the answer away accidentally.
sentences.cn: 她无意中泄露了答案。

sentences.en: Mary accidentally let out that her mother had telephoned.
sentences.cn: 玛丽无意中说出她的母亲来过电话。

sentences.en: John made a big stink about being accidentally short changed.
sentences.cn: 售货员无意中少找了钱,约翰就大叫大嚷起来。

sentences.en: The end of the wire had become accidentally fused with the switch.
sentences.cn: 电线末端意外地与开关接合在一起。

sentences.en: The calculator was damaged accidentally, and we needed to buy a new one.
sentences.cn: 这个计算器被意外弄坏了,我们需要买一个新的。

sentences.en: She accidentally swallowed the poison and death was instantaneous.
sentences.cn: 她意外地吞下了毒药,当即身亡。

sentences.en: I accidentally dropped my glasses into the water.
sentences.cn: 我意外地把眼镜掉进水里了。

sentences.en: He was accidentally blinded in the left eye.
sentences.cn: 他意外弄瞎了左眼。

sentences.en: He was accidentally killed by going too close to Vesuvius.
sentences.cn: 他是因走得太靠近维苏威火山而意外丧生的。

sentences.en: He accidentally shot himself in the foot.
sentences.cn: 他意外走火打中了自己的脚。

sentences.en: The lid won’t come off accidentally,it’s been fastened on.
sentences.cn: 盖子不会掉下来,装得很牢。

sentences.en: While cleaning his shotgun he had accidentally blown his own brains out.
sentences.cn: 他擦猎枪时意外走火，打烂了自己的脑袋。

sentences.en: We had accidentally strayed into the war zone.
sentences.cn: 我们走错路意外地闯进了作战区。

sentences.en: The factory had accidentally released a quantity of toxic waste into the sea.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂意外泄漏大量有毒废物到海中。

sentences.en: The lawyer stressed the fact that the defendant killed the boy accidentally.
sentences.cn: 律师强调被告是意外杀死了那个男孩的。

sentences.en: The pistol discharged accidentally.
sentences.cn: 手枪走火了。

sentences.en: The paper accidentally printed the victim’s address, then compounded their error by printing her name the next day.
sentences.cn: 报纸无意中刊出了受害者的地址，第二天又登出她的姓名，真是一错再错。

sentences.en: “Did you break it accidentally?” “No,on purpose.”
sentences.cn: “你是无意中损坏的吗?”“不,是故意的。”

means.word_mean: 故作意外地；有意装无意地

sentences.en: ‘We’d just finished our meal when John realized he’d accidentally left his chequebook at home.“Accidentally on purpose, you mean!”
sentences.cn: “我们刚吃完饭,这时约翰发现他无意中把支票本落在家里了。”“你是说他是有意装无意吧！”
